"Holy shit, dude!" one of the giant face said. "You did it. You shrunk them! All eight of them. And you got all of them!"

"You sure got all of them? And nobody can trace them to us?" a second giant face said.

"Dude, relax," the third face said. "Everything is under control. Promise."

When the first voice started talking, his voice made the glass vibrate. Probably not enough that the giants would notice, but it definitely made all the cheerleaders lose their footing.

The giants didn't notice. But when they stepped away from the aquarium, the shaking stopped and all the cheerleaders got to their feet. They gathered in a corner, whispering (as if the giants could hear them).

"What? What happened to us?" Courtney asked. She was the newest member of the squad, In any other setting, the shapely Courtney, with her brown eyes and very shapely body would have been considered super hot. On the squad, though, among other super hotties, she just came off as average. But she was anything but average.

"I'm not sure, but that's the Sinatra club," Tara replied. Tara was the Amazonian co-captain of the squad, with long red hair, sparkling green and a pair of Double D breasts that defied gravity.

"Shit!" Darla, the only black cheerleader on the squad, was the one who said it, but they were all thinking it. The Sinatra club was three of the nerdiest science geeks in the school. The called themselves the Sinatra club because they all had blue eyes. They were obsessed with the school's cheerleading squad, and were always trying to get peeks at them. Even after the cheerleaders had had their boyfriends kick their asses over and over, the Sinatra club still was obsessed the cheerleader.

And now, somehow, the Sinatra club had managed to capture all the cheerleaders and shrunk them as well! What were they going to do?

The girls didn't have long to wait, as the Sinatra club came back to view their captives.

"I say we start with Courtney." That suggestion came from Frank, the one who was worried about if they were going to get caught. "She'll probably put up the least fight."

Courtney shrank in on herself, as Tara stepped in between her and the giant faces. That just made the three nerds laugh.

"I say we start with Darla. See how that brown sugar tastes." That was Albert, the one who said that he had taken care of everything.

"Fuck you, you white pieces of shit," Darla shouted, flipping all three nerds off. That got all three nerds laughing.

"Now, I say we start with Lisa," That suggestion was made by Tom, the final nerd. Lisa was a statuesque blond, who was a bit on the shy side. "Let's find out if she's a real blonde." Lisa turned pale and huddled together with another cheerleader.

After a brief discussion, the Sinatra club decided to start off with
1522.title: three giant faces looking in

15222.content:
"Time for some jungle love," Albert said, reaching in for Darla.

The other girls actually tried to rush in and protect Darla, but Albertly effortly brushed in and picked Darla up.

Darla was suddenly very meek as Albert set her on the table right outside of the aquarium. The other cheerleaders looked on silently, knowing Darla's fate was going to be theirs.

"What...what are you going to do to me?" Darla asked, obviously frightened.

"Don't worry, Darla," Albert said, his voice taking on a soothing quality. "We're not going to do anything to hurt you. I mean, even though you cheerleaders treat as bad, we're always there to do homework and stuff, aren't we?"

Darla nodded.

"And we think you eight are the most gorgeous women in the world," Frank added. "We would never do anything to hurt you. In fact, from now on, your life is going to be one of luxury and relaxation."

"So what do we have to do to?" Darla asked.

"Well, to start with," Tom answered, "Take off your top and bra."
15222.title: Darla

152222.content:
"Fuck you!" The words were out of Darla's mouth before she knew she was talking.

The Sinatras just laughed.

"We thought that might be your choice," Albert said. Even though Darla tried to dodge him, Albert easily caught her.

The other two guys brought over a board with Velcro straps, and before she knew it, Darla was strapped down and spread eagled.

"Last chance," Albert said. "Either you take off your clothes, or I take them off for you. But if I take them off, they may be ruined."

Darla

15224.content:
Besides Lisa, Darla, Courtney and Tara, who were discussed in the last chapter, there are four other cheerleaders on the squad.

Sofia --- A light skinned Hispanic young woman, Sofia has a bright, vibrant personality, dancing brown eyes, and lots of wavy, light brown hair

Ayi -- A petite, Chinese American young woman, with a tight but shapely body, long, dark straight hair that reaches to the small of her back and a habit of bowing her head, blushing and giggling when talking with the opposite sex.

Regina -- The Captain of the squad, she has dark hair, blue eyes, long straight black hair, and a forthright manner of dealing with others

Kiana --- A transfer student from Hawaii, Kiana looks just like a hula girl from a Polynesian postcard.

So, which one of these young women do the Sinatra club start with first.
15224.title: Another choice

153.content:
"Get off me!"

The order came from Wanda, the head cheerleader. Somehow, when Courtney had fallen asleep (however that happened), she had fallen asleep beside/on top of Wanda.

"Sorry," said Courtney sheepishly, as she rolled to one side, only to find herself landing on another cheerleader.

There was a lot of pushing, grumbling, shouting and complaining as eight cheerleaders found themselves waking up in very cramped quarters. In reality, they were waking up shrunken to approximately six inches, and were inside a purse. They would discover they were in a purse when...

James, the smartest guy in school

1532.content:
The top of wherever the cheerleaders were opened up, and a giant face appeared.

"Be quiet! We're almost there," the giant face said, before closing the top again.

The cheerleaders still didn't recognize where they were, but they all recognized the face that had admonished them, even though it was gigantic now.

The face belonged to...
1532.title: someone opened the purse up

choices: they decide to take a shower, to help them wake up
notice something weird about the locker room
try to exit the locker room
the Geek Squad decide to start playing with the cheerleaders now
155.content:
Courtney was confused, wondering what had happened. One minute she and the other cheerleaders had just talked about practice had went, and their plans for the weekend, and other subjects that come up when a group of young women get together. The next minute, she found herself waking up on the floor.

She wasn't the only one who was picking herself up off the floor. All eight of the cheerleader (which included Courtney) were picking themselves up off the floor. There was a lot of confusion but, as they looked around, everything looked normal.

Except everything wasn't normal.

The locker room, including the attached shower room and other facilities, looked normal, but the reality was, Courtney and the other cheerleaders were in a specially crafted mockup of their locker room, one that was specifically designed to accommodate their new six inch high bodies. Everything would work, but if they tried to exit the locker room, they would find the doors would not open. The only way into and out of the locker room was to lift the roof off. Which is how they were placed into the new version of the locker room in the first place.

The eight cheerleaders had been shrunken down by four baseball players collectively known as the Geek Squad. At Courtney's high school, even though the baseball team actually did better than the football team. the members of the baseball team were considered a couple of notches below football players in the social order of Courtney's high school. So cheerleaders would date football players and other popular guys, but baseball players were beneath their notice.

The geek squad was made up of four white baseball players who were smart, athletic and kind of good looking. But just not high enough in the pecking order of things to warrant the attention of the cheerleaders. In the normal course of things, the members of the Geek Squad would have resigned themselves to graduating without ever having gotten to date a cheerleader.

But that was before one of the members had invented a shrinking device that defied the laws of physics. He talked to the other members of the Geek Squad, and a plan was formed. Each member of the Geek Squad had his two favorite cheerleaders, so the plan was, create a model of the girls' locker room, knock out and shrink the cheerleaders, put them into the miniature locker room, and see what happens next.

Fortunately for the Geek Squad, there were plenty of mirrors in the actual locker room, so they could put one way mirrors and tiny cameras all over the miniature locker room, and see what the cheerleaders were doing, without the cheerleaders knowing they wee being watched.

As the cheerleaders woke up,
155.title: other Athletes

choices: walk out onto a table top, with the Geek Squad looking down at them
1553.content:
"What...what happened?" Courtney asked, picking herself up off the floor.

"No idea," responded Callista, the co-Captain of the cheerleaders remarked, also picking herself up off the floor.

As the rest of the cheerleaders gained consciousness, they began discussing what could have happened. Celeste, the captain of the cheerleaders, took charge.

"It would probably be best if we get out into the open air," she said. "Follow me."

The cheerleaders head to the exit and
1553.title: try to exit the locker room

info.brief_description: Female teen athletes shrink and you decide what happens. Up to 1000 GP for good additions!
info.description:
Female teen athletes shrink and you decide what happens.

This story was originally posted by Girl Shrinker, but it seems to have been taken down. So I'm reposting the best threads, leaving out the poor ones, and adding some new content. Ultimately this should create an even better story.

Make it interesting! Fetish fuel is nice, but try to develop the characters and plot too.

PLEASE TRY TO AVOID:
1) Torture in a way that would cause permanent damage, such as tearing off limbs.
2) Foot worship. There's more than enough of that in the shrinking genre already.
3) Pissing, pooping, or excreting anything onto the tiny girls.
4) Giantess stuff. Girl/girl interaction is okay, but don't grow a girl beyond her normal height.

Please add! Up to 1000 Gift Points for good additions.
